title: How do I check the available space in the internal storage and microSD card?
answer:
On the home screen, touch Settings > Storage. Check the available space in INTERNAL STORAGE and SD CARD. 

 The internal storage comes with your phone and is determined at delivery. The capacity of the SD card depends on the SD card that you inserted to the phone.
